## RestServer.\_setupOpenApiSpecEndpoints() method

Mount /openapi.json, /openapi.yaml for specs and /swagger-ui, /explorer to redirect to externally hosted API explorer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _setupOpenApiSpecEndpoints(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
